name: Fish, Sharks and Treasure!
description:
this game was made for the 

LM0B Beginners Game Jam #21

Thank you to everyone who was part of that it was great fun making the game! and im having great fun playing all of yours!

Fish, Sharks and Treasure was made using the Ursina game engine in python, if your one of the few python game devs, I highly recommend you give it a look!

this game was made in 5 days, which was difficult! I had never used Aseprite, or did that much pixel art, so to make a game and the art in a week was a welcome but challenging task!

The game uses a color pallet which you can see here, I added a red color so the player would pop, and stand out!

If you get a lot of treasure, be sure to say how much in the comments below!

Also if you find any bugs don't be afraid to post them below, ill try fix them the best I can!
